trait.name: Aura of Authority
entries: While in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the hobgoblin, the hobgoblin and its allies have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls and saving throws, provided the hobgoblin doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes three attacks, using Javelin or Longsword in any combination.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Piercing damage, and the target's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} decreases by 10 feet until the start of the hobgoblin's next turn.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: {@actTrigger} The hobgoblin is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon. {@actResponse} The hobgoblin adds 3 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.
